options.text: It will continue to reach us

options.label: B
options.text: It will be lost in space

options.label: C
options.text: It will be absorbed by the Local Group

options.label: D
options.text: It will be shifted to longer wavelengths and become undetectable

options.text: The Milky Way

options.label: B
options.text: The Andromeda Galaxy

options.label: C

options.label: D
